required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tocilizumab and Atezolizumab in Adults With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Refractory to 1st Line Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor-Based Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ib-II Trial of Tocilizumab and Atezolizumab in Patients With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Refractory to 1st Line Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor-Based Therapy

lead_sponsor.agency: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

clinical_study.source: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

brief_summary.textblock: This is a research study to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of tocilizumab in combination with atezolizumab to treat non-small cell lung cancer.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of protocol treatment until radiologic disease assessment at 12 weeks.
primary_outcome.description: Assess the proportion of patients with a radiologic response by RECIST 1.1 at 12 weeks.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of protocol treatment until death due to any cause or last patient contact alive until 3 months after study closure.
secondary_outcome.description: Estimate the time from first dose of protocol treatment until death due to any cause or last patient contact alive until 3 months after study closure

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose Limiting Toxicities of the combination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of protocol treatment until 49 days post treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Determine dose limiting toxicities of the combination

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From 1st dose of treatment until 1st radiologic disease progression, unequivocal clinical progression, or death due to any cause censored at the last scheduled disease assessment on study if no progression date registered, assessed up to 24 months.
secondary_outcome.description: Estimate the time from first dose of protocol treatment until first radiologic disease progression, unequivocal clinical progression, or death due to any cause censored at the last scheduled disease assessment on study if there is no progression date registered.

other_outcome.time_frame: From enrollment until dealth due to any cause or last patient contact alive until 3 months after study closure
other_outcome.description: Correlate clinical outcomes with potential markers of immune escape and changes in the tumor microenvironment and blood using a novel field theory based methods under development by Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory.

arm_group.description: Participants receive Atezolizumab 1200mg IV and Tocilizumab 6mg/kg IV (or Tocilizumab 4mg/kg IV) every 21 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Advanced non-squamous NSCLC (Stage IV or recurrent after initial curative intent therapy) in adults age 18 or older
- Prior exposure to at least 1 line of therapy
- Exposure to a including checkpoint inhibitor in line of therapy immediately prior to enrollment on trial
- ECOG PS 0-2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of a driver mutation that is susceptible to targeted therapy
- No greater than CTCAE v5 grade 3 toxicity attributed to prior immunotherapy
- Other active invasive malignancy requiring ongoing therapy
- Evidence of progressing or untreated brain metastases
- Evidence or history of leptomeningeal disease
- Uncontrolled tumor related pain
- History of an autoimmune disease or IPF

overall_official.affiliation: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

facility.name: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania
